title: Government Wants Credit For Moderna’s Covid Vaccine
sub_head: It is an unfortunate tendency of regulators to develop the self-delusion that they create what they regulate and must seize control of it.
body:
I appreciate the tremendous effort made by Moderna innovators (“Ganging Up on Moderna” (Review and Outlook, Nov. 17) and happily received the company’s vaccine and booster. It is an unfortunate tendency of those who regulate pharmaceuticals to develop the self-delusion that they create what they regulate and must seize control of it. Those who want to live must not be sacrificed to such a destructive political ideology.
Richard E. Ralston
